title: Strategies for Effective Instructor Roles in Online Mathematics Learning

context.additional_context: Re-establishing the instructor's role and developing learner-tailored interaction strategies in asynchronous math education environments utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can categorize instructor intervention levels into at least three types based on feedback types provided in online assessment systems
Learners can perform over 80% of weekly learning plan adjustment requests for instructors' flexible learning activity design in asynchronous environments
Learners can sustain one-on-one Q&A sessions with instructors using technical support tools within the LMS at least twice a week.

resources: Real-time Video Conferencing Tool (for Supplemental Explanations)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
